caption: Deploy ERC-721 Collection
doc: Deploy a ERC-721 collection smart contract.

ADW.caption: Name
ADW.doc: The name of this ERC-721 smart contract. This will be visible when viewing this NFT collection on NFT marketplaces such as OpenSea or Rarible.
ADW.name: name

ADX.caption: Description
ADX.default_val: This ERC-721 smart contract was deployed using The web3 toolbox created by JackMorgan.xyz
ADX.doc: The description of this ERC-721 smart contract. This will be visible when viewing this NFT collection on NFT marketplaces such as OpenSea or Rarible. of this ERC-721 smart contract. This will only be visible when viewing this NFT collection on NFT marketplaces such as OpenSea or Rarible.
ADX.name: description

ADY.caption: Image
ADY.doc: The image of this ERC-721 smart contract. This will be visible when viewing this NFT collection on NFT marketplaces such as OpenSea or Rarible. This can be the value of a image uploader or an IPFS links formatted: ipfs://<CID>
ADY.name: image

ADZ.caption: Primary Sale Recipient
ADZ.doc: The wallet address that will receive the funds generated from the initial sale of NFTs minted from this smart contract.
ADZ.name: primary_sale_recipient

ADa.caption: Royalty Fee Recipient
ADa.doc: Optional: The wallet address that will receive the funds generated from secondary sales of NFTs minted from this smart contract.
ADa.name: royalty_fee_recipient

ADb.caption: Royalty Fee Percentage
ADb.doc: Optional: The percentage in basis points of secondary sales on NFTs minted from the market place that will be sent to the royalty fee recipient.
ADb.name: royalty_fee_percentage

ADc.caption: Symbol
ADc.doc: The symbol of this ERC-721 smart contract. This will only be visible when viewing this ERC-20 smart contract on a block explorer.
ADc.name: symbol
